sentences.english: A chemical substance that can cause alterations in developing cells at the embryonic stage of development.
sentences.chinese: 畸胎原能引起發展中的胚胎產生細胞改變的化學物質。

sentences.english: Teratogenity test and dominant lethal test in mice were negative.
sentences.chinese: 致畸胎試驗和致突變試經均爲陰性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical diagnosis and treatment of cavernous sinus teratoma .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討海綿竇畸胎瘤的臨牀診斷和治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the MRI features and its pathological basis of intraspinal teratomas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討椎管內畸胎瘤的MRI特徵及其病理學基礎。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical and pathological characteristics of ovarian mature cystic teratoma with malignant transformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討卵巢成熟性囊性畸胎瘤惡變的臨牀病理特點。

sentences.english: In contrast with the ovary, pure benign teratomas of the testis are very rare.
sentences.chinese: 與卵巢相比，睾丸中單純良性畸胎瘤是非常少見的。

sentences.english: An increasing number of teats are available for detecting foetal abnomolities.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的測試方法可用來檢測畸胎。

sentences.english: More seen benign teratomas and thymomas, operational effect were characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 畸胎瘤及胸腺瘤均以良性多見，手術效果好。

sentences.english: Methods 10 cases of spinal teratomas were analyzed with clinical and radiography.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析10例脊髓畸胎瘤的臨牀和影像表現。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging characters of spinal teratomas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脊髓畸胎瘤的影像診斷。

sentences.english: This is embryonal carcinoma mixed with teratoma.
sentences.chinese: 這是混有畸胎瘤的胚胎癌。

sentences.english: Malignant degree of immature teratoma can be reverse.
sentences.chinese: 未成熟畸胎瘤的惡性程度可逆轉。

sentences.english: Mature teratomas of the mediastinum are benign lesions.
sentences.chinese: 縱膈腔之成熟畸胎瘤大多是良性病變。

sentences.english: The growth of galls and the appearance of teratomas were investgated.
sentences.chinese: 觀察了它們的生長，畸胎瘤發生。

sentences.english: In 2 cases with spine canal teratoma, heterogeneous signal mass in the dural sac.
sentences.chinese: 椎管內畸胎瘤2例，硬膜囊內不均勻信號團塊狀佔位。

sentences.english: There is rare recurrence in mature teratoma after complete resection.
sentences.chinese: 成熟畸胎瘤手術全切後，複發率極低。

definition: to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
